definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It is the face of a conspirator.

sentences.chinese: 高度自我中心的病态阴谋家。

sentences.english: The " plotters " were then ordered to be placed under arrest.
sentences.chinese: 这些“阴谋家”被依法撤职逮捕。
高度自我中心的病态阴谋家。

sentences.english: He is the greatest schemer of all time.
sentences.chinese: 他是从古至今最大的阴谋家。

sentences.english: The plotters incited the soldiers to rise against their officers.
sentences.chinese: 阴谋家煽动士兵们造军官的反。

sentences.english: Anyone who pins his hopes on such schemers will likewise find that he has been badly duped.
sentences.chinese: 如果寄希望于这些阴谋家，同样将大上其当。

sentences.english: He himself admits he is a schemer.
sentences.chinese: 他承认自己是个阴谋家。

sentences.english: The world is full of schemers who are just waiting to take you for a ride.
sentences.chinese: 这世上遍地是等着拉你下水的阴谋家。

definition: rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
see 居心叵測|居心叵测[ju1 xin1 po3 ce4]
art of politics/political tricks (often derog.)/power play/to play at politics/underhand trickery
variant of 老奸巨猾[lao3 jian1 ju4 hua2]
deceitful in many ways (idiom); wily and mischievous/full of craft and cunning
